mapper.sql: id, name, age, birthday, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into user
id,
name,
age,
birthday,
create_time,
update_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
